resources.string: Welcome to Pebble Connect with httpebble support, this app allows your Pebble smart watch to communicate with the Internet, access your location, store data and receive notifications. This app does not need to be open or running to be used by your Pebble.
To get started, check out some httpebble watch faces.
If you would like to get notifications or use IFTTT with your Pebble, visit the Cloud Access section
This app uses the httpebble protocol. Further information and support can be found in the Pebble forums.
The source code can be found on GitHub.

Cloud Access allows your Pebble to receive notifications and data from the Internet. Your Pebble can be used as a channel on If This Then That or you can use the API to integrate with just about anything else. For more information please see the documentation.

These are your user id and user tokens. They are used to send data to your Pebble, anyone with your id and token can send data to your Pebble, so keep them safe. Please choose something unique for your user id such as your email. Changing your token at anytime will invalidate you previous token and not allow it to send data to your Pebble.
